block.p: Rachel Elaine Benson, the daughter of Elizabeth Benson of San Francisco and Arnold Benson of New York, was married last evening to Michael Joshua Demmer, a son of Regina Demmer and Peter Demmer, also of New York. The Rev. Tamara Markwick, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Mayacamas Ranch in Calistoga, Calif.

The bride, 29, is a candidate for a master's degree in television and video production at San Francisco State University. She graduated from Connecticut College. Her father is a cardiologist in New York. Her mother is a lawyer in San Francisco.

Rachel Elaine Benson, the daughter of Elizabeth Benson of San Francisco and Arnold Benson of New York, was married last evening to Michael Joshua Demmer, a son of Regina Demmer and Peter Demmer, also of New York. The Rev. Tamara Markwick, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Mayacamas Ranch in Calistoga, Calif.

Rachel Elaine Benson, the daughter of Elizabeth Benson of San Francisco and Arnold Benson of New York, was married last evening to Michael Joshua Demmer, a son of Regina Demmer and Peter Demmer, also of New York. The Rev. Tamara Markwick, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Mayacamas Ranch in Calistoga, Calif.

The bride, 29, is a candidate for a master's degree in television and video production at San Francisco State University. She graduated from Connecticut College. Her father is a cardiologist in New York. Her mother is a lawyer in San Francisco.

The bridegroom, 28, is a candidate for a doctorate in computer science at the University of California, Berkeley. He graduated from Brown. His mother is an account manager at Knowtions, a software and services company in Paramus, N.J. His father is the founder and the chief executive of Sterling Resources, a management consulting and market research company, also in Paramus.
